kiribathgoda sathiye pola pawathina dinayan hi sesu dinawalata wada para depasa padika welendunge welenda kuti nisa gamana gamanayata mahath badha athi wana bawa nagarawasihu pawasathi.sathiye pola dinayan hi di wahanayakin thaba payinwath gaman kirimata wath idakada nathi athara kiribathgoda nagaraye (kolambaa – mahanuwara maha margaye) wahana thadabadayata da mahath hethuwak wi thibe.kiribathgoda wihara maha dewi balika widuhala, dalugama ramasinha maha widuhala, kara yana ena sisu daru dariyanta meya mahath badhawaki.
